METER_IS_NOT_IN_PCL_MODE - Static variable in class com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.constant.PCLinkLibraryExceptionMessage
Meter is not in PCL Model
In some case, when connect meter and don't receive command {0x51,0x54,0x0,0x0,0x0,0x0,0xa5,0xa4}, means meter is not in PCL Mode
